name: Pech
description: The Pech is a small elemental with mastery over stone and earth, showing a sturdy build given its natural armor.
memorable: Unique resilience with immunity to poison and conditions like paralysis, and its ability to incapacitate foes.
goals: Typically seeks to protect its rocky environment and maintain balance within it.
relations: Can be found alongside other earth elementals or in rocky terrains with various creatures.
environment: Usually found in rocky or underground areas.
strengths: Immunity to various conditions and a powerful melee ability with potential to incapacitate enemies.
weaknesses: Light Sensitivity; vulnerable in bright light leads to disadvantage on attacks and perception checks.
attacks: Multiattack feature allows the Pech to strike with a pick and a hammer, dealing piercing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: One with the Stone grants temporary resistance to piercing and slashing damage, enhancing survivability.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in dark environments.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Perception, it excels in physical contests and noticing environmental details.
additional_information: Resistance to piercing and slashing damage when in contact with stone.
Can incapacitate enemies with a successful multiattack.
Effective in rocky environments due to climbing ability.
test_queries: creature with natural armor in rocky areas
earth guardian that can incapacitate foes
neutral good creature immune to poison
